title: Emotes not working all the time

replies.body:
Have you noticed this happening in different game modes possibly? I'm wondering if, for instance, the emotes were working on SR because you had the right emote page selected next to your ward at the bottom. Then, maybe it wasn't working in the next game because it was a different game mode where the emotes weren't correctly selected. Make sure you're choosing the emotes at the bottom right next to your ward choice and summoner spells.

If this *is* a bug, make sure you post it in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) where the devs will actually see it.
Okay I'll do some confirmation tests to make sure. (I only really play SR at this point. and I think i only have one page.) will check those things and if they are correct i'll file a bug report.
